values:
I finally did it.

I started training classes :)

I am a  bit behind (ok waaay behind) on responding to this but since mom's death everything has taken a backseat to finally doing something about the crappy work situation I had been in.  In brief I went back to WIS.  With that being said...


First thank you James for your kind words about mom.  Yes I know the holidays were lopsided and I apologize but you know how my mom was, especially around Xmas! *L*   She was always like that... drove me crazy.....  THe sad thing is last xmas we didn't celebrate christmas together on the day for the first time I can honestly remember..... unfortunatly it turned out to be the last one.

MOm really could light up a room.  I wish in some ways I was like her... but Martha stewart i could never be, and my mom could give Martha stewart a run for her money *L*




Just remember.......  Your parents won't be there forever......  treasure them.

Don't worry about stirring things up with that post. Unless the wife gets mad *L*  That isn't my fault :-P

brandy

My mom passed away today :(

Damn... My mom passed away.

I miss her already.  MOM i love you !

brandy

Work just got really ...interesting...


My boss just got a promotion and is moving.  The gent who is taking his place(i assume) and I don't; get along outside of when we are working.

On the one hand this might mean I need to go back to WIS, on the other hand why do I keep geting this feeling that I am finally going to get my breaK?

On to more fun topics.. I just rolled my my first character for dnd in godess knows how long >:)

SHe is a  lawful evil necromancer sorceress!  I am debating whether to make her multiclass dread necromancer(which will work her up into a potential longterm goal of being a lich!) or a true necromancer...... 

I am having fun with her :)

Great.... I am now a gadget freak this past year.

It all started getting my first Ipod.  Then I changed it out for a video ipod.

Then I got a alarm clock radio with an ipod doc.

THen my sister got me a portable dvd player with ipod doc for my b-day and i got a wireless router.


I got my laptop at Xmas :)  and a wifi printer as well!

Needless to say, when i was on the road this week *check out the new states added to the states i have visited map!* i had plenty of things to keep me entertained!  

Now work is getting more interesting ..... But that is for another day.

I just had a b-day and got a computer router(i am getting a laptop for christmas and i wanted to be able to hook both up!)

I am proud of myself because i actually managed to get the son of a bitch working :-O

Now just waiting for the laptop.... and i hope i got the settings right *L*

damn,

We just finished our last store of this season and are on a 3 week or so hiatus.

Man... Has it really been almost 3 years?

Still not management  but i am not giving up, damnit >:)

And as usual i outlasted another set of idiots!  He he... sadly i outlasted some veterans as well.....

for those of you who don't watch football well i don't either but.,...


APP this past weekend Beat Michigan in what is possibly the biggest upset in modern football history :)

Well.....


Things just have been weird lately.

I have had quite a few guys ask me out....   Not sure if  I am ready to date again..  (yeah I know it's been over 2 years so sue me :-P  )

While I am still not a manager I am so well trained in Pharmacy I could almost run it (methinks it is a Marshall/Jamal  plot  along with me doing the equip-manager job again *L*)


And a couple of weeks ago at Lowes(what is it about trips to Lowes and me?  ) I wound up doing audits.

i swear....

We started doing Cvs's this week...and I have already done pharmacy twice.  Geezus


Jamal comes by and tells me that is probably going to be a regular thing for me...except i am supposed to be going to columbia...


Well.....  

It looks very well like i am not... but Q is still going to make me a production supervisor.


WHAT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


Given what happened only 4 months ago i need to make sure there is no problem with this.

What next?  and we haven't finished the 3 week of the new year

Well....

I am not going to be a trainer.

hold the comments...







go down....





just a little further...........


Drum roll please:







Ladies and gents brandy is going to be a production supervisor ie a manager for the Columbia office >:)



Straight from my bosses mouth

One damn thing after another....

Christmas came and went.  

Dutifly finished my 2 week notice with WIS.  Geezus...   if i have to sticker one more damn dg....

Was on the road all last week at my new job....  evidently somebody didn't tell me the full extent of my new position.   I am to be the trainer/recruiter for the columbia office..... go figure!

Wow.

I just put in my 2 week notice at WIS to go with my boss to another inventory company.

A nice fat raise :)

And i have been offered the promotion I have been waiting for.  Moving to Columbia SC :-D

The Democrats won the house majority.

Oh and I believe my step father just won his second term as Sherriff of Forsyth County! HUZZAH!

Work is slowing down for the year.  Bah... what am I going to do the next month and a half?  :)

Got a raise!!!  Ok Only ten cents but given that technicly i wasn't elligble for it I am very pleased!

Still working on the management thingy but at least i seem to be making progress :D

Ummmm


Not ready for more responsibility?  


I was scheduled mon to take a crew mon to a Lowes...with no managers with us.

I joked about being team leader for the day...

then they wanted the same people back the next day.

We get there tues and bruce asks me to select people to work in flooring..with me as *GET THIS*  SUB CREW MANAGER!

whAT?


ummmmmmm


and Quincy knew about it before hand?


DId i miss something?

Ok....

I was told They weren't ready to give me more responsibility at work, yet... 

they give me a key to the office.


HUh?

Work sucks.

I have been told I have things to work on so the management shit is a no go for now. great jerks tell me this after I move.

Not to mention i am still stuck on the crew from hell.


Shock treatment is coming out on dvd finally on tues :)

Work is been hell lately.

But last night was great.

I need to burn a cd for travel to work:

1. Wanted dead or alive by bon jovi

2.Its my life Bon jovi

3. welcome to wherever you are by bon jovi

4.  who says you can't go home by bon Jovi

5.  Raise your hands by bon jovi

6. hold back the rain by d2

7. sunrise by d2

8. get it on by power station

9.  the flame by arcadia

10 we will rock you we are the champions by queen

these are mostly inspiring/ adrenaline boosting songs :)

http://www.myspace.com/durandurancoversgrandmasterflash  I just checked this out.

Not bad, dedicated to Duranies.  From... my ex???????

Very nice.

Except one visual detail... not sure if it is my browser settings or not but the text is really fuzzy.. i had to select the text to be able to read it.  Accurate as well... 

I have to do things to blow people's minds every so often.... People think they know me.... he he... not even my best friend knows everything about me >:P

Life keeps getting more interesting.

I didnt get a raise this time.  However something is coming up and QUincy hasn't forgotten the fact i want to go into management.  But.. my god things are getting weird.

Today is my anniversary as equip manager >:)

And... this person will see this and realize i am talking about her... Do you mean duran duran's remake of WHite Lines?   I have a copy of it on cd somewhere, and while we dont like each other i will be more than happy to spread the duran duran around. >:)

Yes even I can be nice every once and awhile >:)

http://www.usatoday.com/news/offbeat/2006-07-27-sexradio_x.htm?csp=34&POE=click-refer

Ok, this is fubabed.( you know fucked up beyond all belief!)

What it is like to want something and yet it seems so far away.

This whole management process seems like its either stalling or going backwards.  I had a bad night the other night and well you all know how I get on those nights.  I am afraid I fucked my chances up :*(

Yet at the same time something tells me to keep doing what I do best.  ANd quit beating myself up.  

Maybe finally I get the last of my stuff moved out of the storage area  next week during my time off. ANd a new bed. The one I "inherited" from the ex my dad deemed needed replacing.

He he... maybe once I get it set up look into getting some non-flowery sheets and shit.

Ugh,

Work is still crazy.  WOnder if I will ever make management.


On the other hand I swear Q and the rest of the managers think I can be at two places at once *L*  I was originally scheduled for Wens.  Then I was scheduled for Target.  THen last night one of the managers changed it to a Dollar General.  Now its changed back to Target.  Make up thine minds or duke it out please  :P

Well I finally got all my stuff out of the old apt.

Work is still insane :O

Listening to some brobdinagian bards....

Moving stuff...  But not much :P

Happy 4th!

one damn thing after another....

My computer gets brought down to rock hill and goes belly up.. just got it back in order...

Still moving... vehicle for transport of furnisings is out of service.

i learned pharmacy the other night :)

He he... went to carrowinds fri... rode everything adult but water rides *mild cold*  saw the school of rock (way cool!)  and did the hands up thingy on thunder road :)

Yikes,

I have been transferred to charlotte office.... even though i am still moving!    

Getting ready to move the main computer because Comporium is installing tommorow! :)  I hope they are there before i have to leave for a Target tommorow night.

Well... Evidently i Have started management training.  QUincy had me take all the IS modules and next month i will be viewing what the managers did. 


Though I really wished i moved on the first floor... carrying full cases of machines up three floors is no picnic :*(

I am moving...

Just another month and I will kiss Hickory goodbye :)

I will miss my friends here *waves to Jason and everybody... you know who you are*  

But, That's the way it goes.

Work is getting ready to get crazy again..  Nice timing... Ugh


brandy

okies... One year of liberation >:)

that out of the way....

things at work never fail to amaze me!

I wound up in Columbia thurs doing a food lion.  I go in and do my equip manager thingy.

Fast forward to fri.  Same management team.  I walk in with my regular crew and they tell me quincy had told them to expect the equip manager from charlotte.  Boy were they suprised to find out it was me *L*  OOPsy.... Didn't the fact I came in and started working on the machines the day before give them a clue?

Lately everyone is making comments that Quincy maybe sending me down to Columbia to help them out.... Not sure if they are joking or not but this is getting down right creepy!

Ummmm....

On another note... i finally got a dvd player that isnt part of my computer... spent 30 min on the phone with dad trying to figure out why i wasn't getting a picture... till i changed the line output >:)  BINGO!


Mon if Quincy doesn't change my schedule I am going to a Target in Myrtle Beach....  Maybe I can get our crew to stop at the ocean to dip my toes in ;)

:)

Okies.... We are going every bloody place lately... Today was an easy day.... a 2 hr shoe store using the old machines.  Had to take sometime to remember the commands for stuff.


We are no longer bailing one of the offices out.. we are practicly doing their inventories!

Ummm..

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u-wmqyEXC44

A duran video I have never seen...... whoa!

We finally settled on an apt in Rock Hill.  Move date is June 2nd.

:)

Haven't even read half of it...

http://www.lordofthepeeps.com/lotp/fotp.html

Ok so my one year is on Tues... I am not even going to be in town for it :P

I will be in Orlando Fla helping count a Target!  

Other news... Brown stuff hitting rotary device happening with some friends... Lets just say  I won't be going to Ginger anytime soon... And no i haven't gone psycho.....  Nothing to do with me actually


And would angie please check in?

Oh and good luck to Bon Jovi with the CMA's! Too bad I will be counting a Target that night :P

Tommorow I will be at WIS International for a year.

Wow....

In that amount of time I have not only traveled up and down the east coast from wv to georgia(with a coming trip this week to florida! Orlando here we come!) and tenn.  i have climbed miles of ladders battled 100's of boxes in stockrooms and had a few hundred pieces of underwear fall on top of me in softlines.

I almost always get the password....  I have learned some of the computer stuff...

I am the equip manager for Charlotte...

Yikes!

I left to go home from my inventory and quincy calls me asking me if i want to drive marshall to his inventory tonight.... in the van!

I am a certified driver but never been allowed to drive...

Oh boy.....

Wish me the best of luck!

Your Candy Heart Says "My Way"
You love to be in love, as long as it means being showered with attention. And no need for you to give anything in return - being with you is gift enough. Your ideal Valentine's Day date: a first class trip to Hawaii Your flirting style: witty and showy What turns you off: having to "chase" someone Why you're hot: you're more confident (and arrogant) than a rock star!
What Does Your Candy Heart Say?

He he....

I am either really bored or something....

Before anyone thinks i am a meanie , my family is an arguement in favor of the ecumenical movement in we have every other major christian denomination represented in it.

that being said...

Fav responses to have you found jesus...

"what!  is he lost?'"

"have you found cthulu?"

"how can you lose a god?"

"yes he is sitting on my altar! " *My altar has a representation of him and the VIrgin Mary along with Bast!*

Kinda been in a deep blue lately.

In process of finding an apt in Rock Hill SC....

While driving I was listening to the new Bon Jovi album.... Wow.

Especially the song "Welcome to Whereever you are" It was like the divine knew what i needed to hear.

ugh....

I had my first Target of the season last night... got home at 4 am... was supposed to see apts today(yeah right!)

I get there hoping the machines are preprogrammed... no such luck... so Tina and I start with the 30+ charlotte machines... with one card.... well jamal gets a second one ready.... Tina leaves me to program all of them and miguel and crew show up... another 10 machines added to an already large pile!

Well after getting them programed batteries plugged in and a crew briefing later I get to counting in the stockroom.  We finish and when i get back from break i show up in the middle of crew briefing.   No big deal.  i get on the floor and not even halfway through my 1st section my battery starts dying.... I go to replace it and karen has me retrieve a battery belt and the stop and goes.

Later my battery dies(again) and when i go to get more they have me refill the pack with fresh batteries....  

well to make a long story short i only do 4 sections on the sales floor all night....


Q pulls me off counting 30 min before we are done and tells me to get all the machines ready... i get them all together and realize i have 14 cases of machines from 3-5 offices to figure out whose belong to whom!

ack!


well i guess they dont call it equip manager for nothing eh?  *L*


OH and i finally got a copy of durans' first 11 videos(a honest to god real copy >:P )

Just a note I do read certain people's blogs and don't care if they know it.

With that disclaimer being said, I found out I do have something in common with my ex's wife... We both can't stand Brian(i assume it is the same guy that comes over and does the plumming once in a blue moon).    I knew the guy was a creep(he made passes at me....) and for some fucked up reason he once in a while sends me jokes he think is funny) but I never knew he was like that.

Wouldn't suprise me.  In the least.


My thoughts go out to his "girlfriend"(i hope for her sake that is no longer the case)

Who Should Paint You: Andy Warhol
You've got an interested edge that would be reflected in any portrait
You don't need any fancy paint techniques to stand out from the crowd!
What Artist Should Paint Your Portrait?
You Are The Sun
You represent the best of life - vitality, success, and and truth.
You tend to have a strong, centered, balanced personality.
Inspiration and discovery are your fortes. You are very mentally strong.
A talented mind, you tend to excel at math, philosophy, and music.

Your fortune:

As well as you have done in the past, the future is going to be filled with more success.
A new creative project is coming your way. Feed it, and it will grow into something huge.
Great riches, recognition, prosperity, or happiness is coming your way.
And it's possible that a fantastic vacation, or a new baby, is coming sooner than you think.
What Tarot Card Are You?

*HACK HACK* dang cough

Things are getting even more interesting...

Quincy the other day while we were finishing up the linen and things had told me and sharon I we ought to look into applying for the management jobs coming available next month.... I was like ok.... The last couple of times it was someone else he said this to.... 

Maybe soon i will learn pharmacy....   We are doing quite a few Eckards lately... And how do you count what isn't there?( i am serious... it is for stocking purposes! I know because i was counting what wasn't there *L*)

And, after months of telling me I should learn the computer stuff at work, Marshall finally got me to try my first thing on the computer the other day >:)

Evidence I have way too much time on my hands(ummmm a Brandy parody! I am sure anyone who works for WIS or Regis can relate to this)

Our aq1 who art in topstock
Accurate be your upc
your end of day come your finished reports be done
on sales floor as it is in stock room
Give us this day our daily break
and forgive us our sitdowns as we forgive those newbies who screw up for the umpteenth time
lead us not into insanity and deliver us from whining...
 
amen.

Your Stipper Song Is
Pour Some Sugar on Me by Def Leppard "Love is like a bomb, baby, c'mon get it on Livin' like a lover with a radar phone Lookin' like a tramp, like a video vamp Demolition woman, can I be your man?" Break out the baby oil, you rock it old school.
What Song Should You Strip To?
I just found out that I am now officially the Charlotte Office equipment manager >:)
Ummm i got back from Bon Jovi*it rocked!* and found out i need to be at linen and things at 5:30....  ACK!

Hiya...

IT has been a long week so i will keep this short and post more tommorow/

Looks like my equip manage job really impressed quincy.  He is creating a special position in the office(at my suggestion) to do basicly what i do for the whole office and take it to the next level.. and along with my counting I am to move up into it >:)

Also i had my job appraisal today.... I got a 40 cent raise!
